Florence Ozor (a mụrụ n'afọ 1980) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria n'azọ maka oke ụmụ nwany Naijiria,onye na-azụ ahịa, na otu onye nke ndị otu atụmatụ Bring Back Our Girls
A mụrụ Florence Ozor n'afọ 1980, na Legọs,nke Naijiria, nwa nke etiti na ezinụlọ nke ụmụ nwanyị ise
Ọ gụrụ akụkọ ihe mere eme na mmekọrịta mba ụwa, yana ọmụmụ banyere ọchịchị na Legọs, Harvard na Singapore
Ozor rụrụ ọrụ na ngalaba eyimeyi, nrụpụta, mgbasa ozi na mmekọrịta ọhaneze, ma banye na nkwukọrịta ụlọ ọrụ yana mmekọrịta gọọmentị n'ihe dịka afọ 2010

N’afọ 2014, Ozor nọrọ ọtụtụ izu na Washington, DC, dịka otu n’ime ụmụ nwanyị iri abụọ na atọ n’ime mmemme Global Women Mentoring nke <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/U.S._State_Department" rel="mw:ExtLink" title="U.S
Dịka akụkụ nke a, ọ gara njem nleta na Colorado steeti dị n'Amerịka , were kọwapụta ọnọdụ ụmụ agbọghọ na-efu efu, na-ekwu na ụwa nọ n'ihe ize ndụ nke ichezọ ha

N'afọ 2014, Ozor gara 2014 Women Leadership Retreat na Entusi Resort na Retreat Center dị na Uganda, ebe o mere ka ndị niile bịara ya see foto n’azụ ọkọlọtọ ‘Bring Back Our Girls’ ma gwa Newsweek banyere ya

Ozor bụ otu n’ime mmadụ abụọ binyere aka na mgbasa ozi  ‘Bring Back Our Girls’ nke ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2017, Mr President, time to act is now, ya na Oby Ezekwesili, na-ekwu na ọ bụ ụbọchị 1,277, ma na 113 n’ime ụmụada ahụ ka nọ n’agha
O guzobela Florence Ozor Foundation, otu ụlọ ọrụ na-abụghị nke gọọmentị, nke na-abụghị maka uru na-elekwasị anya na ọchịchịi na ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ ntakịrị nwanyị na Naijiria

Ozor bụ onye kwuru okwu n'ọgbakọ nke "Political Empowerment of Women in Africa and in Europe" na Brussels na Septemba afọ 2017, nke Global Progressive Forum na PES Women haziri dị ka akụkụ nke 2017 Africa Week
